languages.text:
Wielder is able to shoot Ranged weapons in Melee range.
All wielder's Ranged attacks on adjacent targets gain +{uip|Critical Hit Chance|e9aec82234b847ef8532feed4f674f31}% Critical Hit Chance.

The wearer can use ranged weapons in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

Персонаж может использовать дистанционное оружие в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}.
Дистанционные атаки против целей на соседних клетках получают +{uip|Critical Hit Chance|e9aec82234b847ef8532feed4f674f31}% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g}.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş menzilinde{/g} menzilli silah kullanabilir.
Takan kişinin bitişikteki hedeflere yaptığı menzilli saldırıları, +%{uip|Critical Hit Chance|e9aec82234b847ef8532feed4f674f31} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır.

languages.text:
El portador puede utilizar armas a distancia dentro del alcance de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.
Los ataques a distancia del portador contra objetivos adyacentes ganan un +{uip|Critical Hit Chance|e9aec82234b847ef8532feed4f674f31} % de probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.

Los ataques a distancia del portador contra objetivos adyacentes ganan un +{uip|Critical Hit Chance|e9aec82234b847ef8532feed4f674f31} % de probabilidad de impacto crítico.

languages.text:
装备者可以在{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}范围内使用远程武器。
装备者使用远程攻击命中邻近敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高{uip|Critical Hit Chance|e9aec82234b847ef8532feed4f674f31}%。
